name: Meckwear Desert Brown Enduro Crossover Gloves
description:
LIMITED PRODUCTION

GLOVE FEATURES:-Blister Prevention for tough riding, breathable -durable Amara -gel padding -silicon grip -knuckle protection -great flexibility

STANDARD SIZES:-, Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, 2XL,3XL

COLORS:-Black, Dark Blue, Red, Orange, Neon Green,Neon Yellow, Meckwear Brown Limited production

SAFETY:-Daynatic Kevlar knuckle protection-Amara palm -inner index/thumb gel padded protection- along with over the finger Rexen

MATERIALS USED:-Amara -breathable mesh -silicon -gel padding -neoprene

CARE:-hand wash -line dry -do not put in laundry machine or dryer.  Note if Velcro touches nylon mesh degrading of mesh will take place.

OVERVIEW: Built to protect and ride in extreme conditions.  Tough enough to be worn for motorcycles riding off road, nimble enough for mountain biking, and BMX
